foodDescription: Green peppers, zucchini, spinach, pears, grana padano cheese, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, sliced turkey breast.
Arugula, raddichio, beets, cherry tomatoes, onions, balsamic vinegar, and grated Romano cheese.
Fresh Maryland jumbo crab meat over mixed greens, avocado, asparagus, and roasted peppers.
Roasted asparagus, smoked salmon, mushrooms, mixed olives, prosciutto, and gorgonzola cheese.
Fritter made with roasted chicken, pear tomatoes, avocado salad, and truffle vinaigrette.
Mixed bell peppers, sun dried tomato spread, cucumbers, spinach, and fresh mozzarella.
Salami, pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers, sausage, feta cheese, and Canadian bacon.
BBQ chicken, pepper, tomatoes, pineapple, mushrooms, and onions (tomato sauce or ranch).
Bacon, eggs, heats of palm, onions, tomatoes, ham, peppers, oregano, spicy sauce.
Whole milk mozzarella, ricotta cheese, fresh spinach, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers, sliced tomatoes, and ripe black olives.
Crushed tomatoes, shredded mozzarella, hormone-free pepperoni,and shredded Parmesan cheese.
Red sauce, sweet Italian sausage, red chilli flakes, creamy mozzarella, broccoli rabe, marinated cherry tomatoes, and pecorino Romano.
wo charbroiled beef patties, two strips of bacon, two slices of melted American cheese, and BBQ Sauce.
One charbroiled beef patty, guacamole, bacon, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, red onions, and sour-sweet sauce.
A crispy chicken fillet, topped with bacon, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, and ranch dressing.
Double meat, double cheese, grilled onions, cucumber, lettuce & tomato on plain bun.
One charbroiled beef patty, cheese, jalapeño coins, and Santa Fe Sauce, served on a fresh baked bun.
One chicken fillet, pesto aioli, lettuce, tomato, onion, and Swiss cheese on a toasted bun. Served with fries.
